alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 7:05PM CDT until June 03 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Ellis County in north central Texas... Southwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Desoto, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Hutchins, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Oak Leaf, Pecan Hill, Rockett and Trumbull. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 405 and 420. Interstate 20 between mile markers 460 and 472. Interstate 45 between mile markers 263 and 266, and between mile markers 275 and 278. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
